parameters.value:
<%= outcome = "Completed"
if @results.has_key?('Status - Cancelled')
  outcome = "Cancelled"
elsif @results.has_key?('Status - Approval - Denied')
  outcome = "Denied"
end
outcome%>

parameters.description: JSON Object Representing the Body
parameters.label: Body
parameters.value:
<%= 
values = JSON.parse(@results['Merge Submission and Descendant Values']['Values JSON'])
result = {}

# Loop over each value and remove nil's and join arrays
values.each do |k, v|
  # If the field is for a complex type (IE list)
  if v.is_a?(Array)
    unless v.empty?
      # Check to see if it's a Hash (Attachments)
      if v[0].is_a?(Hash)
        output = ''
        v.each_with_index do |val, index|
          next unless val.key?('contentType')
          output << if index == v.size - 1
                      "Attachment Name: #{val['name']} (#{val['contentType']})"
                    else
                      "Attachment Name: #{val['name']} (#{val['contentType']})\n"
                    end
        end
        result[k] = output
      else
        result[k] = v.join(', ')
      end
      end
  # If the field is for a date/time
  elsif v =~ /^\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\dT\d\d:\d\d:\d\d\+00:00$/
    result[k] = DateTime.parse(v).strftime('%c')
  # If the field is for a date
  elsif v =~ /^\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d$/
    result[k] = DateTime.parse(v).strftime('%D')
  # If the field is for a time
  elsif v =~ /^\d\d:\d\d$/
    result[k] = DateTime.parse(v).strftime('%r')
  # If the field is a normal field
  else
    result[k] = v
  end
end

table = ''
result.keys.each do |key|
  table << "#{key}: #{result[key]}\n"
end
table

  body = {
    "short_description":values['Summary'],
    "description":"This Change Ticket was created from Kinetic Request Submission #{@submission['Id']}\n\nDETAILS:\n#{table}"
  
}

body.to_json
 %>

parameters.label: Details
parameters.value:
<%= 
values = JSON.parse(@results['Merge Submission and Descendant Values']['Values JSON'])
result = {}

# Loop over each value and remove nil's and join arrays
values.each do |k, v|
  # If the field is for a complex type (IE list)
  if v.is_a?(Array)
    unless v.empty?
      # Check to see if it's a Hash (Attachments)
      if v[0].is_a?(Hash)
        output = ''
        v.each_with_index do |val, index|
          next unless val.key?('contentType')
          output << if index == v.size - 1
                      "Attachment Name: #{val['name']} (#{val['contentType']})"
                    else
                      "Attachment Name: #{val['name']} (#{val['contentType']})\n"
                    end
        end
        result[k] = output
      else
        result[k] = v.join(', ')
      end
      end
  # If the field is for a date/time
  elsif v =~ /^\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\dT\d\d:\d\d:\d\d\+00:00$/
    result[k] = DateTime.parse(v).strftime('%c')
  # If the field is for a date
  elsif v =~ /^\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d$/
    result[k] = DateTime.parse(v).strftime('%D')
  # If the field is for a time
  elsif v =~ /^\d\d:\d\d$/
    result[k] = DateTime.parse(v).strftime('%r')
  # If the field is a normal field
  else
    result[k] = v
  end
end

table = ''
result.keys.each do |key|
  table << "#{key}: #{result[key]}\n"
end
table

"This Change Ticket was created from Kinetic Request Submission #{@submission['Id']}\n\nDETAILS:\n#{table}"%>
